## AbstractWallet.signPsbt() method

Signs a PSBT (Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction) given its hexadecimal representation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
signPsbt(psbtHex: string): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

psbtHex


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The hexadecimal string representation of the PSBT to be signed.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string&gt;

A promise that resolves to the signed PSBT in hexadecimal format.
